description: Hot Mess Express (Shown in Grey Frost, Other color options available)
Thank you for visiting Sassy Tee Design Co! Where only the BEST quality, softest apparel can be found!
**To Order Please select your shirt style (Womens V Neck T-Shirt, , Unisex T-Shirt), Shirt Color, Shirt Size, and Text color from the drop down menus.
If you need ANY assistance just send us a message and we would be glad to help!
We offer two styles of shirts:
*Women's Cut V Neck in Sizes XS-4XL This is not a boxy tee, it tapers in at the waist and flares at the hips for a truly feminine silhouette. It is NOT Fitted, and runs true to size.
*Modern UNISEX Cut T-Shirt This Modern Unisex Cut T Shirt is available in sizes XS-4XL As It is a unisex cut, ladies please size down one size if choosing this option.
Please see size chart to get the exact measurements for all the styles that we offer =)
***Our designs which won't crack, fade or peel, are available with several different font or design color choices including Glitter. The Glitter does not flake off. =)
**We Print and ship from the USA!
